content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position x1)
- Stone Furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position x1) receiving iron ore
- Stone Furnace (position x2) receiving iron ore
- Stone Furnace (position x1) receiving coal
- Stone Furnace (position x2) receiving coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is ready to accept items before inserting. Check the inventory of the furnace to confirm it is not full.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has produced items. Verify the output inventory of the furnace before attempting extraction.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move closer to the target entity from which you want to extract items before executing the extraction command.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in that position.
